title: I hate bots that spam
body:
I was recently having a nice day playing League and I decided to take a break and logged out. When I got back on I realised I had been hacked some how and if you are sent the link below then do not click on it:

riot is giving out free mystery gifts to celebrate msi get yours here 

EDIT: Shouldn't show the link so I removed it, but if u see someone send the message above with a link attached, do not click it

replies.body:
Hi summoner, 

**Please don't post any links here**, as other players might click on the links (even if they obvious scams)

>Be sure to send in a support ticket to Riot with the name of the bot and their message so the account can be banned (pref send screenshots).

>Please keep in mind that player support is busy and it may take a lil while for them to get back to you (almost always reply within a week). During this time do not lodge multiple tickets or continue adding information to your existing ticket, as it may send your enquiry to the back of the queue.

>Due to privacy reasons Riot can't respond to your ticket with details about if a punishment was handed out or not.

If you do encounter a scam and your account becomes compromised, please go through and change all your passwords and verify your email [HERE](https://account.leagueoflegends.com/oce/en/protect).

You can read more about keeping your account safe [HERE](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account)

There is even a fun little infographic about account safety [HERE](http://eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/account-security-education/?utm_source=eune_en&utm_medium=fpcard&utm_campaign=ase). 

Stay safe ♥

> [{quoted}](name=Princess Yaia,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=wfwnTvvQ,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-05-07T14:00:51.143+0000)
>
> Hi summoner, 
> 
> **Please don't post any links here**, as other players might click on the links (even if they obvious scams)
> 
> If you do encounter a scam and your account becomes compromised, please go through and change all your passwords and verify your email [HERE](https://account.leagueoflegends.com/oce/en/protect).
> 
> You can read more about keeping your account safe [HERE](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account)
> 
> There is even a fun little infographic about account safety [HERE](http://eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/account-security-education/?utm_source=eune_en&utm_medium=fpcard&utm_campaign=ase). 
> 
> Stay safe ♥

You say not to post links then post 3 links to other pages disguised as "HERE" you won't get me with your scams you dam scammer you!!!!!!! I wont not clik them links
They're all internal links to official Riot support website so you won't get the pop-up notification telling you not to facecheck the bush :P

> [{quoted}](name=Princess Yaia,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=wfwnTvvQ,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2016-05-07T14:43:46.949+0000)
>
> They're all internal links to official Riot support website so you won't get the pop-up notification telling you not to facecheck the bush :P

wtf is up with ur name being blue and that other dude has a green name is that a riot thing or a fek thing

Riot thing. We are part of the volunteer program. 

Blue- [Instructors](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy/RaWrI4Hi-introducing-the-instructors)
Green- [Emissaries](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behaviour/Edu7E6Bp-introducing-the-emissaries)
Yellow- [Wrenchmen](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/nE4lj5EB-introducing-the-wrenchmen)

> [{quoted}](name=Princess Yaia,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=wfwnTvvQ,comment-id=00020000000000000000,timestamp=2016-05-07T15:09:13.024+0000)

> Green- [Emissaries](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behaviour/Edu7E6Bp-introducing-the-emissaries)
> Yellow- [Wrenchmen](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/nE4lj5EB-introducing-the-wrenchmen)

I want to be a wrenchman so I can fix this broken game and put it back how it should be, bestow the power upon me now
Remove the link, in case someone accidentally clicks it somehow

I clicked it. Because I knew full well its a scam

**+** what godforsaken idiot could possibly believe this is ritos doing

http://imgur.com/Jqqv7DV

Do people not get told what sort of links are bullshit these days?

.co.vu is sussed as fuck.
